children.text: There has not been waterproofing propely installed to the balcony, which may result in water leaking.
Part 3.8.1.3 - External above ground membranes of the NCC’s Building Code of Australia requires that
‘Waterproofing membranes for external above ground use must comply with AS 4654.1 and AS 4654.2’ .
This balcony will need to be properly waterproofed with the correct vertical upward termination height above the finished floor height, in accordance with the BCA and AS4654.
